Module net.etf.project
Package net.etf.project.gui

Class MapController

java.lang.Object
net.etf.project.gui.MapController
public class MapController extends Object
The MapController class is responsible for managing the graphical representation of a map in the application using a GridPane. It handles the addition and removal of vehicles on the map and manages switching between different scenes.

    • MapController

      public MapController()

  • Method Details

    • disableMenuItems

      public void disableMenuItems()
      Disables user from selecting some of the controls while the simulation is still running as their outcome is generated at the end.

    • enableMenuItems

      public void enableMenuItems()
      Enables selecting all possible options when the simulation is complete.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the map by creating a grid of rectangles with a white(wide part of the city) or light gray(narrow part of the city) background and black border. Each grid cell is wrapped in a StackPane containing a rectangle and a label.

    • addVehicleToField

      public void addVehicleToField(int x, int y, String vehicleId, double batteryPercentage)
      Adds a vehicle to the specified map cell. The vehicle's ID and battery percentage are displayed, and the cell is colored blue for cors, green for bicycles or coral for scooters to indicate the vehicle's presence.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the cell
      y - the y-coordinate of the cell
      vehicleId - the ID of the vehicle to be added
      batteryPercentage - the battery percentage of the vehicle

    • removeVehicleFromField

      public void removeVehicleFromField(int x, int y)
      Removes a vehicle from the specified map cell. The cell is reset to a white (for wide part of the city) or light grey (for narrow part of the city) background and the label is cleared.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the cell
      y - the y-coordinate of the cell

    • showMapScene

      public void showMapScene() throws IOException
      Switches the current scene to the map view scene.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file for the scene cannot be loaded

    • showVehiclesScene

      public void showVehiclesScene() throws IOException
      Switches the current scene to the vehicles view scene.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file for the scene cannot be loaded

    • showMalfunctionsScene

      public void showMalfunctionsScene() throws IOException
      Switches the current scene to the malfunctions view scene.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file for the scene cannot be loaded

    • showReportsScene

      public void showReportsScene() throws IOException
      Switches the current scene to the reports view scene.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file for the scene cannot be loaded

    • showDeserializedVehiclesScene

      public void showDeserializedVehiclesScene() throws IOException
      Switches the current scene to the deserialized vehicles view scene.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file for the scene cannot be loaded
